articles.author: Charlotte Daly
articles.title: Nicolas Pepe 'wants to leave Arsenal this summer after hiring new agent to find him a club' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Nicolas Pepe became the Gunners' record signing in 2019 when he joined from Lille for £72million, but he has struggled to cement his place in the first XI this season. As a result, he wants to leave the club.
articles.content:
Nicolas Pepe wants to leave Arsenal during the summer transfer window and has reportedly asked his agent to begin negotiations with other clubs.

articles.title: Manchester City footballer Ilkay Gundogan MARRIES model fiancée Sara Arfaoui in private ceremony - Daily Mail
articles.description: Manchester City footballer Ilkay Gundogan revealed on Instagram on Wednesday that he has married his model fiancée Sara Arfaoui, five months after they became engaged.

articles.title: Chelsea: Thomas Tuchel confirms Barcelona-bound Andreas Christensen has pulled out of MULTIPLE games - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Dane, 26, who will join Barcelona this summer, took himself out of contention for the defeat by Liverpool hours before kick-off. Tuchel refused to reveal the defender's exact reasons.
